com.gliffy.restunit
Class RestCall

java.lang.Object
  com.gliffy.restunit.RestCall
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BodyCall, GetCall
public class RestCall
extends Object
implements Serializable, Cloneable

A call to a REST endpoint. This is essentially a test of an HTTP method to a URL

See Also:

Method Detail

getURL

public String getURL()
The URL being called. This can be a complete URL or a partial one; it depends on your runtime configuration. The recommendation is that your calls only have URLs relative to the REST service root

Returns:
the URL being called.

clone

public Object clone()
Returns a deep-ish copy of this object. All fields are copied as via Object.clone(), however all internal collections are also copied, so that you can freely change them in the returned object without affecting this one. Those collections' contents will still be the same objects as this call, however.

Overrides:
clone in class Object
Returns:
a deeper-than-shallow copy of this object.
